Dialogue.Page: Hatchling! Hearth's sake, get away from that thing! Don't go losing a limb like me.
What are you still doing here anyways? I thought you were suppose to be taking that tin can of yours into space today.

DialogueOption.Text: I came over here to see what crashed.
Is that a Dark Bramble seed?

Dialogue.Page: Hatchling! Hearth's sake, get away from that thing! Don't go losing a limb like me. I don't need the seed causing any more damage than it already has!
Blasted thing… I liked this crater.

Same as me, then. I dunno what this thing is, exactly. Looks like some kind of plant seed, but it’s not anything I’ve seen on Timber Hearth before - and trust me, I was quite the explorer back in the day.
D’you think it’s extraterrestrial? It kinda looks like something that might’ve come off of Dark Bramble. Whatever it is, it put down roots in a hurry.
Heyo, hatchling! Nice find you've got there. I assume you're back down here to show it off?
Me? I was using the old scout launcher and saw smoke in one of the photos, so I thought I’d come over here myself and take a look.
Blasted seed did a lot of damage when it crashed. I liked this crater.
Oh, hatchling. Nice thing you've got there. Sorry, I'm a bit distracted at the moment. Need something from me?
Goodness. First this seed, now the sun's looking all wonky… what's going on?
Oh, hatchling. I didn't see you there. Sorry, I'm a bit distracted at the moment.
I was using the old scout launcher and saw smoke in one of the photos, so I thought I’d come over here myself and take a look.
Goodness. First this seed, now the sun's looking all wonky… what's going on?
Oh, hatchling. I didn't see you there. Sorry, I'm a bit distracted at the moment. Need something from me?
Hugs are much appreciated, hatchling, much appreciated. Sorry if I seem distracted, it's just 'cause I am. Need something?
Stars above! What's happening?! Is that coming from the seed?
